message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. That's a bit more than I'm looking to spend. I'm interested in the product but I can only do $80 right now. What do you think?
I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, Bob. I can meet you halfway. How about we try $120?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $120 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $95. If we can't meet somewhere in the middle, I might have to go with another seller.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I can see that $95 is a good compromise. Let me think for a moment... Ah, I can do $105. That's as low as I can go.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still not quite there at $105.  Let's split the difference - I'll offer $95, and I'm sure we can reach an agreement.
I see you're still trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we try $100?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price again.  I'm willing to go to $90. Let's see if we can find a middle ground here.
I'm getting close to your price, Bob. I can do $92. That's the lowest I can go.

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm still not quite there at $92. I'm going to offer my final price of $90, and I hope we can finally close the deal. If it doesn't work out, I'll have to go with another seller.
